::Blacknighmare::

Blacknightmare watching the situation she decided to comm with other 
Predacons.  She moved a small distance of the protophorm and her 
leader and she spoke with low voice "Blacknightmare to Killfest... Do 
you copy?"

 
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest raises an eyebrow plate at Apocolipse. "Hmm.. Empire, 
> interesting way to put it."
> 
> He looks back at the screen, "But lets not make up names untill we 
> are sure we are in command. I will contribute Demise, EndBringer, 
and 
> Scyther."
> 
> A silent order over the internal communication system with his team 
> sent the three walking toward the exit of the base. He looks at 
> DrillBit and Apocalypse. "Scyther will almost certainly be able to 
> avoid all radar, but I don't suggest sending him in. Megatron would 
> be expecting something like that."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> >  Apoclaaypse sent a comm to his troops ordering them to mobilize 
> infront of 
> > the base. "They cant see us comeing by scan because of the 
jamming 
> zone made 
> > by Magnus. Luckly it is on the edge of the zone." He nodded his 
> head and and 
> > held out his hand. "To the new empire. The only empire."
